name: Shop of Tentacles
storyline:
One day, I woke up to a doll made of dirt.
When he opened the door of the cellar, ten sinners escaped from inside.
In order to know their whereabouts, we needed the strange creatures growing out of the lake.
At the behest of the shopkeeper, a doll and a one-eyed boy decide to raise a strange creature, a tentacle.
summary:
This is an application game for smartphones.
They harvest or multiply the tentacles growing on the lake and aim to complete the picture book. Hand the tentacles to the owner, get alcohol and collect stories.
Let's try to complete the tentacles and the story in a maddening asian gothic world!
